forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. High 9C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and wind. Thunder possible. High 47F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 42F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High near 10C. SSE winds shifting to WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 48F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning with occasional rain during the afternoon. It will be windy at times. High 9C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning, windy during the afternoon with occasional rain. High 47F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 41F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 42F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 16C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 59F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Low 43F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 61F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 44F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
